Description: Shoe for the left foot of a child, made of stitched red leather, with rounded toe, toe strap and part of sole missing, part of ankle straps remaining, resin on sole.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405574001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum Published: Veldmeijer, Studies of Ancient Egyptian Footwear. Technological Aspects. Part XVII. Leather Stubbed-Toe Ankle Shoes. Jaarbericht “ex oriente lux” 44, (2012-2013), pp. 4, 8-9, fig. 2.
